text: nakattaiyuṭaiya aṉaittaiyum yūtarkaḷukku nām harāmākkiyiruntōm; āṭu, māṭu ākiyavaṟṟil - avaṟṟiṉ mutukukaḷilō allatu vayiṟukaḷilō allatu elumpukaḷuṭaṉ kalantō irukkum koḻuppait tavira maṟṟa avaṟṟiṉ koḻuppaiyum harāmākkiṉōm - avarkaḷ akkiramam ceyta kāraṇattiṉāl avarkaḷukku itaṉai nām kūliyāka koṭuttōm - niccayamāka nām uṇmaiyē kūṟukiṟōm
